overview:
Simon joined Deezer in 2009 as Chief Financial Officer. One year after, he was nominated Deputy CEO of Deezer and stayed in charge of the Finance department.

Prior to that, he co-founded two consulting firms, SBA-Conseil and Sport Value, in which he supported several financial and management operations (press, tourism, event …).

From 2005 to 2008, he served as Financial Director of GIP Coupe du Monde de Rugby 2007.

Simon He began his career in the banking industry within Toulouse & Associ√©s (acquired by Gruppo Banca Leonardo).

Simon graduated from the Universities Paris XI, Birmingham and ESSEC.
